column15: Buy original Fusion Clutch at best price in India. Read its features  reviews and specifications. Get fast & assured delivery all over India.
column17:
FUSION Clutch (242):
Stylish and functional this glitzy and glittery clutch from Fusion is an ideal pick for the urban women. This one fold clutch bag comes with a zippered closure and buttoned flap for extra safety of the essentials that you carry in it. Also this compact clutch bag has two compartments one of which features card holders and a transparent pocket. Accentuating the look of this clutch bag are the metal embellishments studded on the upper along with the stitch detailing.
